under25MedContDisclaimer.text: Businesses with fewer than 25 covered individuals are not required to pay the employer share, but must still to send the employee share of the medical leave contribution.
helpText: The employer share is 60% of the medical leave contribution.
The employee share is 40% of the medical leave contribution.
